title: The First Kled bug.
body: When unmounted Kled does not take damage from monsters or abilities. Basic attacks work though, as i observed in a stream cait's ult had no effect on the unmounted kled and the jungle buffs didn't damage him when he was unmounted so therefore he can possibly solo baron considering he can't die from monsters.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! In the future, please use the [report a bug feature](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create) on PBE to report bugs on PBE, as opposed to live. It helps us better keep track of where issues are occurring. ^-^
